question.title: Print Elements of Array
question.content:
Given an array arr[], print all its elements space-separated.

Note: You don't need to move to the next line after printing all elements of the array (space-separated)

Examples:

Input: arr[] = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
Output: 1 2 3 4 5

Input: arr[] = [2, 3, 5, 5]
Output: 2 3 5 5

Constraints:
1 <= arr.size <= 106
1 <= arr[i] <= 108

rephrased.body: Given an array `arr[]`, print all its elements separated by spaces on a single line. Do not add a newline character after the last element.

hints: iterate over all elements of the array and print each element
